scenes.text:
Are you interested in trying out baseball or softball? The Cardiff University Baseball & Softball Club, also known as the Cardiff Cubs, is a vibrant community focused on both sports. Founded in 2017 as the Cardiff Softball Club, we now actively participate in competitive university baseball leagues and are excited to welcome new members.

This year, our club is undergoing a revitalization with new faces and fresh energy. We welcome players of all experience levels, whether you've played baseball your whole life or are completely new to the sport. Our mixed league ensures that everyone is welcome and can enjoy the game.

Our classes are held regularly throughout the week, Our practice sessions are held twice a week, providing ample opportunity for you to get involved:

Tuesdays: 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM at Talybont Hockey Pitch
Wednesdays: 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM at Talybont Training Village

If you have your own equipment, feel free to bring it along. If not, we have plenty of equipment to spare, so you can jump right into the action.

We offer a standard membership for Â£20

These memberships give you access to our sessions competitions and social events.

Our club competes in the BUCS league, with several matches throughout the year to satisfy any competitive spirit. Whether you're looking to compete or just enjoy the sport recreationally, we have something for everyone. 

We often host socials such as pub nights, club trips as well as all sorts of non-alcoholic events, just like in sport we have something for everyone.
